DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect theobromine blood lipid parameter healthy subject . Secondary objective determine effect cocoa interaction effect cocoa theobromine blood lipid parameter . Hypothesis : theobromine positive effect blood lipid parameter .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Theobromine Blood Lipid Parameters Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy men postmenopausal woman : medical condition might affect study measurement ( judge study physician ) Willing able participate study protocol Written inform consent Age 4070 year 10year risk develop CHD < 10 % , base data Framingham Heart Study BMI > 18 < 30 kg/m2 Blood pressure , heart rate , haematological clinical chemical parameter within normal reference range judge research physician Willing comply dietary restriction study . Accessible vein arm ( ) determine examination screen Previous cardiovascular event ( ) ( stroke , TIA , angina , myocardial infarction , heart failure ) Diabetes mellitus Reported alcohol consumption > 14 units/week ( female ) > 21 units/week ( male ) Currently medically prescribe diet , slimming diet Reported weight loss gain 10 % body weight period 6 month prestudy examination Reported intense sporting activity > 10 h/w Use prescribe medication may interfere study measurement , judge physician Use antibiotic three month screen study . Currently smoke nonsmoker less 6 month report use nicotine containing product 6 month precede study study Reported intolerance test product food product provide study Blood donation 1 month ( male ) 2 month ( female ) prior screen study Reported participation another nutritional biomedical trial 3 month screen study .
